Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

The femmes were beginning to get close of Where Zardus and his 
followers were. Ocipite was more nervous

"Where're close" said  Aelo

"Close of what?" said Ocipite

"I don't know" replied Aelo

"Great!!!" answered Ocipite "sisters I have the bad feeling that 
somehting wrong will happen..."

"Come on what could happen?" said Celeno


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Mosquitor::
> 
> Zardus keeps his scanners locked onto the three femms, making sure 
to 
> know when the they begin to get close (please post them "beginning 
to 
> get close" before they get there, if that's where they're heading, 
> Airly, so I can reply). He looks down again as Mosquitor speaks.
> 
> "I have headache..." the idiot mosquito says, sitting up and 
rubbing 
> his head. He sees Zardus, his optics widening, but Zardus motions 
for 
> him to be quiet.
> 
> "We're on a mission from Hell Beast, Mosquitor," Zardus says to the 
> bot. "Follow my orders. He'll be pleased when I take you to him."
> 
> He stands up and helps Mosquitor up, looking to Wheeljack and 
> Hurricane. "Find a hiding place. If they go to this room, we'll 
take 
> them out. Mosquitor, go into the vines. Tackle them when they get 
> here."
> 
> Mosquitor nods and flies up quietly into the vines, Zardus walking 
> over to a large fallen plate.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> > 
> > ::To keep their energy signatures minimal, they stand pretty 
still, 
> and not 
> > making any sudden moves.  They keep their scanners on the three 
> bots outside::
